title: [bug] Rengar e and leap range
body:
1. Since the instant double q of rengar got patched you can't use your ferocity e sometimes even against minions and monsters which is really bad if you gank someone and you can't snare him. This doesn't occur every ferocity e but sometimes it does.
2. I played another Rengar game today and something really weird happened: As I was ganking botlane with my ult my leap range got really really small when I wanted to get into the bush to reset the leap. I dont know why this happened (might aswell have been some bug with lulu or something); no it was not due to lulu silence, I just couldn't leap further than half of the leap range.

Please fix that Rito :)), Rengar got hard enough after you nerfed his e and q ratio don't destroy him completely with these bugs thx :))

Also i saw this happening on Wingsofdeath's stream with other champs like Aurelion Sol where he couldn't cast his ult when it was up.

Btw I don't know how to get a screenshot into this post so forgive me, please. ^^
